titleStmt.title: By the Protector. A proclamation signifying His Highness pleasure, that all men being in office of government, at the decease of his most dear father, Oliver late Lord Protector, shall so continue till His Highness further direction.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1658-1660 : R. Cromwell)
Cromwell, Richard, 1626-1712.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills and John Field, Printers to His Highness the Lord Protector,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at White-Hall this fourth of September, in the year of our Lord God, one thousand six hundred fifty and eight.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
